mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_follow SET from_iuser = #{fromIuser}, to_iuser = #{toIuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{fromIuser} AND to_iuser = #{toIuser}
mapper.select: SELECT A.nm, A.pic, A.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(DISTINCT B.ifeed) AS feedCnt, COUNT(C.ifeed) AS favCnt, D.following, D.follower, D.followState FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed INNER JOIN( SELECT #{targetIuser} AS iuser, SUM(IF(from_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) AS following, SUM(CASE to_iuser WHEN #{targetIuser} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS follower, (SUM(CASE WHEN from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser = #{targetIuser} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser = #{loginedIuser} THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)) AS followState FROM t_user_follow ) AS D ON A.iuser = D.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{targetIuser}
